_header: And as for you that most are in my mind
Subjects: ballads; love lyrics; lovers, addresses to beloved
_description: A Balade addressed to the beloved — four rhyme royal stanzas

BodFair16.First Lines:
And os for yow that most ar in my myndeLoke in what wyse the wyll I
                    be demened…
BodFair16.Last Lines:
…But of my wo sumwhat I wold ye wystI can no more do wyth me
                    what yow lyst

         London: Scolar Press, 1979.
